text:
Suggestion : create our own glob. It would make life easier for the user (one package not to learn) and we could `intellisort` the result. Meaning that these files:
- sub_1
- sub_10
- sub_11
- sub_12
- sub_2
- sub_20
- sub_21
- sub_22

Would be sorted like this :
- sub_1
- sub_2
- sub_10
- sub_11
- sub_12
- sub_20
- sub_21
- sub_22
